alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 11:18AM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN CALLAHAN...SOUTHEASTERN JONES...SHACKELFORD AND NORTHEASTERN TAYLOR COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 PM CST... At 1118 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hamby, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Clyde, Albany, Baird, Moran, Putnam, Eula, Dudley, Potosi, Ibex, Hamby, Fort Griffin, Mccarty Lake, Us-283 Near The Callahan- Shackelford County Line, Us-180 Near The Shackelford- Stephens County Line, I-20 Near The Callahan- Eastland County Line, and Admiral. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 290 and 323. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
